name: BATTLE ANTICS
description:
Battle Antics - submission for the Zeno Jam 5
Theme: Light Attracts Bugs

Guide your minions with light and destroy the opponents queen!

To play the game, use two controllers and play locally.

Made by Chillstrand & SirDrMcHurtz

Credits:

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
Music: First Round from Candy & Conquer by Audio Creatures
Font: https://www.dafont.com/retro-computer.font
